EmailTemplate.name: MYA_BRD_MRT_1611_NCF_coupon_ThankYou.Email - Thank you eDM
EmailTemplate.subject: We had a blast
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Having trouble viewing this email? View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]>.
<[[https://www.facebook.com/pg/Martell.MY/photos/?tab=album&album_id=1229196490483603]]>
Martell NCF
We smashed the night. Thanks for seeing the light.
It was an awesome night for Martell NCF and even more so because you were there with us.
Where there is curiosity, there is light. So follow the NCF app to get leads on the hottest parties in town.
Find out if you were the light of the party by checking out our highlighted snaps on Facebook.
<[[https://www.facebook.com/pg/Martell.MY/photos/?tab=album&album_id=1229196490483603]]>
Light up the night!
Martell NCF
